Summary

I enjoy fixing, repairing and setting up home and business networks. It's a hobby and a job I enjoy thoroughly. When I can make a customer's computer run the same way it ran right out of the box or even better. That gives me the greatest feeling of satisfaction to see my customer happy with the results while paying as little as half the customer would pay a big name company to do the same job.
